entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a wandmaker who is accused of lying to Lord Voldemort. He is mentioned in the conversation between Lucius and Ollivander.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who was lied to by Ollivander according to Lucius.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is the person that Ollivander sought to help escape from Lucius.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is a person who accuses Ollivander of lying and has his wand destroyed.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Wand is an object that exists between the wands of Lucius and Ollivander.

relationships.description: Lucius accuses Ollivander of lying to Voldemort.
Ollivander sought to help Potter escape from Lucius.
Lucius's wand is destroyed by the connection between his and Ollivander's wands.
Ollivander lied to Voldemort according to Lucius.
